DeleteEditKenneth Lou, Co-founder at SeedlyLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 01 Dec 2018For my family it was Renting a private property. We chose not to go with an exclusive agent. :) I think it varies across, but I think exclusivity comes with time, so maybe if we keep using a same agent and trust builds up, we may be keen for exclusivity. But if it's a one off transaction of a much larger sum (ie a sale of a private landed), I think multiplie agents could work in your favour better :D0 comments0
